person.persName: Aaron Striger (Independence, KY Justice of the Peace/Cooper)

body.p: Independence, Kentucky, cooper and justice of the peace.. Kentucky native. Married to Martha W. Striger. Father of Edmonia Striger, Leslie A. Striger, Clay Striger, and Robert W. Striger. Cooper in Independence in 1860. Justice of the peace in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Kenton County, Independence, p. 4; KYR-0001-007-0307.
